content: TE-Y-HDA-ST Setting tool Setting tool – required for installation of HDA undercut anchors ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Setting tools and accessories ### FEATURES:Features Essential for activating the self-undercutting feature of HDA undercut anchors Industry-standard SDS Max (TE-Y) connection end Applications Automatic self-undercutting operation for installation of HDA undercut anchors ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 287133 - Setting tool HDA M10 w/TE-Y connection - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x ST20-M10/Y Setting tool - 287134 - Setting tool HDA M12 w/TE-Y connection - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x ST22-M12/Y Setting tool - 331846 - Setting tool HDA M16 w/TE-Y connection - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x ST30-M16/Y Setting tool - 339269 - Setting tool HDA M20 w/TE-Y connection - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x ST37-M20/Y Setting tool
